promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a massive simple ibex normal-type wearing white gemstones. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or normal. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Brightox., a massive simple ibex normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: rapid-spin, endure. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word ibex or normal or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, ibex-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, soft ambient light
generatedDescription: Brightox is an enormous creature who loves to roam the open fields. It can take on any challenge with ease and never tires out.
